$interpreted: Devious: You rotten chameleon!
Lazer: High Priest Defeatist, is there something I can help you with?
Devious: Help me? You dare screw around with me! I should be the one asking you, why the hell is he still alive!?
Lazer: Who?
Devious: Hssss~ The thing I hate most is liars. I really don't like liars.
Devious: You can keep pretending. That's fine. But once our contract has been broken, we'll see who suffers more!
Lazer: If you are speaking of the tattooed fellow and his gang, they are indeed still alive.
Devious: You already guaranteed me that you had them eliminated!
Lazer: I never said that. What I said was—— "you'll never see them in the Desert Kingdom ever again."
Lazer: The High Priest was mistaken.
Devious: You dare play these word games with me!?
Lazer: Of course not. I merely believe that the issue was resolved.
Lazer: That filthy mutt, does it matter if he lives or dies? Your grand majesty, is the High Priest truly concerned about those fly-ridden dogs?
Devious: ...Don't provoke me, General Lazer.
Devious: Tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony is of utmost importance. I won't allow anything unpredictable to mess this up. Otherwise...
Devious: ...the next thing that shatters to pieces won't be a lifeless lamp.
Devious: If you truly wish that nothing happens to her, you better pray that tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony will all go as planned.
Lazer: God abandoned me long ago...and now he expects me to get down on my knees and pray?
Diana: Godfather! Why is my schedule so full that I won't be able to attend tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony?
Lazer: It's merely a religious ceremony. Nothing more than a performance. I believe the Queen has more important matters to attend to.
Diana: That man named Sanchez. Wasn't he one of the victors of the Colosseum? Why then was he accused of terrorist activities and arrested again?
Lazer: All I can say is that not everyone is fit for freedom. Or perhaps after throwing off his chains he was unable to find work and strayed from the path.
Lazer: Being a slave might have been better after all.
Diana: Godfather, you've changed...
Diana: You should know better than anyone the value of freedom. How can you say such a thing, just to keep a lie?
Lazer: When did I ever lie to you?
Diana: I know that you've been meeting with Devious in secret lately.
Diana: I can't guess what you're thinking. I almost...don't recognize you at all, Godfather.
Lazer: That is of no importance.
Lazer: All I need is for you to be safe. Even if it means I need to betray you, cause you pain, and make you cry, I will do it all, my child.
Lazer: Tomorrow is the Kingdom's Blessing Ceremony. As long as we can get through tomorrow, everything will be fine...
Diana: Godfather, you can't be this selfish! I have a will of my own! Have you ever asked me?
Diana: Godfather!
Busy Guard: Hey! We ain't got enough men, come 'ere and help out!
Busier Guard: Figure it out yourself! We're busy as all heck over here!
Rune: What's next?
Nikola: So you've discovered that the mysterious Rune symbols are a giant Rune. They are for activating a holy article found in the Snake Bone Shrine──── the Rib of the Snake God.
Rune: What do you mean "activate"?
Nikola: If it gets activated, all of the citizens of the Desert Kingdom, including all those that you know, will face an inescapable death.
Nikola: So I need your help.
Nikola: To stop this evil plot, Sanchez and Elio can then be saved. Get it?
Nikola: The key to breaking the giant Rune lies in front of the Holy Shrine. We must go in.

Model.Text: You rotten chameleon!
High Priest Defeatist, is there something I can help you with?
Help me? You dare screw around with me! I should be the one asking you, why the hell is he still alive!?
Who?
Hssss~ The thing I hate most is liars. I really don't like liars.
You can keep pretending. That's fine. But once our contract has been broken, we'll see who suffers more!
If you are speaking of the tattooed fellow and his gang, they are indeed still alive.
You already guaranteed me that you had them eliminated!
I never said that. What I said was—— "you'll never see them in the Desert Kingdom ever again."
The High Priest was mistaken.
You dare play these word games with me!?
Of course not. I merely believe that the issue was resolved.
That filthy mutt, does it matter if he lives or dies? Your grand majesty, is the High Priest truly concerned about those fly-ridden dogs?
...Don't provoke me, General Lazer.
Tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony is of utmost importance. I won't allow anything unpredictable to mess this up. Otherwise...
...the next thing that shatters to pieces won't be a lifeless lamp.
If you truly wish that nothing happens to her, you better pray that tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony will all go as planned.
God abandoned me long ago...and now he expects me to get down on my knees and pray?
Godfather! Why is my schedule so full that I won't be able to attend tomorrow's Blessing Ceremony?
It's merely a religious ceremony. Nothing more than a performance. I believe the Queen has more important matters to attend to.
That man named Sanchez. Wasn't he one of the victors of the Colosseum? Why then was he accused of terrorist activities and arrested again?
All I can say is that not everyone is fit for freedom. Or perhaps after throwing off his chains he was unable to find work and strayed from the path.
Being a slave might have been better after all.
Godfather, you've changed...
You should know better than anyone the value of freedom. How can you say such a thing, just to keep a lie?
When did I ever lie to you?
I know that you've been meeting with Devious in secret lately.
I can't guess what you're thinking. I almost...don't recognize you at all, Godfather.
That is of no importance.
All I need is for you to be safe. Even if it means I need to betray you, cause you pain, and make you cry, I will do it all, my child.
Tomorrow is the Kingdom's Blessing Ceremony. As long as we can get through tomorrow, everything will be fine...
Godfather, you can't be this selfish! I have a will of my own! Have you ever asked me?
Godfather!
Hey! We ain't got enough men, come 'ere and help out!
Figure it out yourself! We're busy as all heck over here!
What's next?
So you've discovered that the mysterious Rune symbols are a giant Rune. They are for activating a holy article found in the Snake Bone Shrine──── the Rib of the Snake God.
What do you mean "activate"?
If it gets activated, all of the citizens of the Desert Kingdom, including all those that you know, will face an inescapable death.
So I need your help.
To stop this evil plot, Sanchez and Elio can then be saved. Get it?
The key to breaking the giant Rune lies in front of the Holy Shrine. We must go in.
